verses.roman:
siddheśvarāṇāṁ kapilaḥ
suparṇo 'haṁ patatriṇām
prajāpatīnāṁ dakṣo 'haṁ
pitṟṇām aham aryamā

synonyms: siddha-īśvarāṇām—among perfected beings; kapilaḥ—I am Lord Kapila; suparṇaḥ—Garuḍa; aham—I am; patatriṇām—among birds; prajāpatīnām—among the progenitors of mankind; dakṣaḥ—Dakṣa; aham—I am; pitṟṇām—among the forefathers; aham—I am; aryamā—Aryamā.
translation: I am Lord Kapila among perfected beings and Garuḍa among birds. I am Dakṣa among the progenitors of mankind, and I am Aryamā among the forefathers.
